mapper.select: SELECT R.GROUP_NO, REGION_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_DETAIL , DECODE(GROUP_TYPE, 'A', '공개', '비공개') GROUP_TYPE, GROUP_DATE, COUNT(M.GROUP_NO) MEMBER_COUNT FROM GROUP_ROOM R LEFT JOIN REGION_CATEGORY USING(REGION_NO) LEFT JOIN GROUP_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER M ON(R.GROUP_NO = M.GROUP_NO) GROUP BY R.GROUP_NO, REGION_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, GROUP_DETAIL, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_TYPE, GROUP_DATE ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC

SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_NAME, USER_RANK FROM GROUP_ROOM JOIN GROUP_MEMBER USING(GROUP_NO) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY GROUP_NO, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_NAME, USER_RANK ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_ROOM ( GROUP_NO, REGION_NO, CATEGORY_NO, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_DETAIL, GROUP_TYPE, GROUP_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GNO.NEXTVAL, #{regionNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{groupName}, #{groupImg}, #{groupDetail}, #{groupType}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO GROUP_MEMBER ( GROUP_NO, USER_ID, USER_RANK ) VALUES ( SEQ_GNO.CURRVAL, #{userId}, #{userRank} )
INSERT INTO GROUP_CALENDAR VALUES ( SEQ_GCDNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_GNO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_NUMBER - 1 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_GNO'

SELECT R.GROUP_NO, REGION_NO, CATEGORY_NO, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_DETAIL, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_TYPE, GROUP_DATE, COUNT(M.GROUP_NO) MEMBER_COUNT FROM GROUP_ROOM R LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER M ON(R.GROUP_NO = M.GROUP_NO) WHERE R.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} GROUP BY R.GROUP_NO, REGION_NO, CATEGORY_NO, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_DETAIL, GROUP_IMG, GROUP_TYPE, GROUP_DATE
SELECT USER_ID, NICKNAME, DECODE(USER_RANK, 'A', '관리자', '일반회원') AS "USER_RANK", PROFILE_IMG FROM GROUP_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_ID) WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY USER_RANK ASC
